tldr: Affected versions of this package may expose sensitive data because QR codes could be generated without a valid hash. This allowed attackers to iterate over order IDs, reveal payment amounts, and access increment IDs. The fix introduces a required hash derived from unique order attributes, ensuring that QR codes cannot be created—or guessed—without proper authorization.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `schrammel-codes/magento2-epc-qr-code` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
